O21Toolbox.UpdateListings.UpdateDef.content: Version 1.4.8206 - Added: Disable Desirable Apparel - Ideology option that disables those stupid fucking hats defaulting to showing up. - Added: No Friend Shaped Manhunters - Allows control over parameters that can disable an animal from arriving on the map as a manhunter. - Added: Misanthrope Trait - Adds the Misanthrope trait (Dislikes People) and if a pawn was going to spawn with both Misandrist and Misogynist replaces them with Misanthrope. - Added: Skill Rates Adjustment - Control skill gain or loss and a threshold to decide what level and above loss can happen at. - Added: Trait Count Adjustment - Control how many traits pawns spawn with, within a min and max number.

Version 1.4.8163 - Added: Boomalopes Bleed Chemfuel - BURN BABAY! - Added: Chatty Comms - Coms Console is a recreation source. - Added: Not So Wild Berries - Wild Berries now plantable.
- Fixed: Breakdowns no longer patches VFE - Power's reactor due to issues with it. - Fixed: VIE - Memes and structures - It updated and broke the patch, now fixed.

Version 1.3.0 - Fixed Conflict with Roads of the Rim. - No Breakdowns is now disabled automatically if you use SOS2. It causes issues with SOS2. - Added Tweak: Unlocked Meme Buildings - No memes required for buildable ideology stuff. - Added Tweak: Slim Rim - Allows disabling of specific body types on human pawns. - Added Tweak: Healroot to Xerigium - Switch the name of healroot back to its old one, Xerigium. - Added Tweak: Darklight Glow Pods - Makes glowpods use darklight. - Added Tweak: Glowing Ambrosia - Makes Ambrosia glow so it's easier to spot. - Added Tweak: Glowing Healroot - Makes Healroot glow so it's easier to spot. - Added Tweak: Hunters Can Use Melee - Speaks for itself.

Version 1.2.0 - Added Tweak: Infestation Blocking Floors - Added Tweak: No More Drop Pod Raids - Added Tweak: No More Siege Raids - Added Tweak: No More Sapper Raids - Added Tweak: No More Breacher Raids

Version 1.1.0 - Added Tweak: Megasloth to Megatherium - Reverts the name change. - Added Tweak: Impassable Deep Water - Prevents pawns navigating through deep water tiles. - Added Tweak: Prisoners Don't Have Keys - Control whether or not prisoners and slaves can open doors. - Added Tweak: Next Restock Timer - Shows when a settlement will next restock.
- Updated Tweak: Lag Free Lamps - Now includes darklight torches and braziers, as well as Vanilla Expanded candles and wall torches. - Fixed Bug: Faster Smoothing - Now applies properly based on its setting. - Fixed Bug: Power Usage Tweaks - Vanometric Power Cell now correctly provides instead of drains power. - Fixed Conflict: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structure no longer blocks meme unlimiter.
